issue.title: [R] Fix rlang deprecation warning from check_select_helpers()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12113](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12113). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fix the test warning caused by ARROW-11701
```java

1 dplyr::mutate's examples (test-dplyr-mutate.R:252:3) - Subsetting quosures with `[[` is deprecated as of rlang 0.4.0
Please use `quo_get_expr()` instead.
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12113?focusedCommentId=17309971) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9821
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9821>
